comment.body:
It's probably caused by one of the third-party filter lists.
Please add these rules:
```adblock
@@||cdn.cxense.com/cx.cce.js$domain=euractiv.com
@@||cdn.cxense.com/cx.js$domain=euractiv.com
@@||api.cxense.com/public/widget/data?json=$domain=euractiv.com
```
to user rules.

@Alex-302:
> fixed.
No, it's not fixed!
You only fixed it for the `swimsuit` subdomain.
The problem occurs for all videos at `si.com`, so you need to whitelist the cookie consent for the entire `si.com` domain, like I suggested!!

I propose: > ``` > ! https://diecourant.co.za/ (Screenshot 1) > ! Ads > diecourant.co.za##section[id^=smartslider] > diecourant.co.za###secondary > ! Anti-copy scripts > I've identified inline scripts with the IDs "wpcp_disable_selection", "wpcp_disable_Right_Click", and "wpcp-error-message", likely requiring scriptlets to fix, potentially generic ones. > ! https://diecourant.co.za/2023/01/23/sekondere-skoolonderrig-so-lyk-2023-se-fooie/ (Screenshot 2) > I'm stumped on how to fix these without blocking the non-ad graphs. > ``` > The site appears to be in Afrikaans. I did some Afrikaans-Dutch text comparison in Google Translate to see if EasyDutch (uBO's main Dutch list) would be likely to cover it, and I concluded with "Doubtful"; and I recall EasyList Dutch have been sceptical to cover such sites before. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Unfortunately, it can't be checked without an account.
Do you still have it?
As I can see on the screenshot, one request is blocked. Try to add this rule in User rules, wait ~ 1 minute there, then open the site.
```adblock
@@||id.flybuys.com.au/*/fingerprint2.min.js
```
If that does not help, try to disable filters one by one to find the problematic one.

comment.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

1 - if you open the site using uBO with AdGuard Annoyances, you'll see the cookies - these type of the scriptlets work only in AdGuard products. We use them to solve the cases like [this](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/146406#issue-1639638244).
2 - not reproduced it on my end. Try to update the filters, clear browser data, restart it and open the site.

> Issue caused by Fanboy's Annoyances, please fix @ryanbr

issue.title: Breaks downloads at fontshub.pro
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.49.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://fontshub.pro/font/ubuntu-download

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList, EasyPrivacy

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

When you click "Download Ubuntu", it opens a new tab. Then you have to wait 45 seconds. After that, before you can activate the download link, you have to hit one of the buttons to share the link or click the text that says "This is too difficult for me, I just want to download." See screenshot. But AdGuard Annoyances hides this, and you are just left wondering why nothing happens. Adding `fontshub.pro#@#.download-share-box` fixed the issue for me.

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/116532973/235729318-1f119d17-4a9f-4149-9298-7b2646183f7b.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.abante.com.ph/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.abante.com.ph%2F) ### Comment Username: @DandelionSprout > Various ads, some of them video ads. I propose: > ``` > ! https://www.abante.com.ph/#gsc.tab=0 (Screenshot 1) > abante.com.ph#?#section nav ~ section:has(img[width="800"]) > abante.com.ph#?#section nav ~ section:has(.attachment-large) > abante.com.ph#?#.elementor-col-50:has(div[data-settings*=autoplay]) > ||www.abante.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs^ > ||imgs1.abante.com.ph/video/*.mp4^ > ||www.abante.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/*.gif$image > ||abante.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/*-1024x1024$image > ! https://www.abante.com.ph/2023/05/02/giants-nanliit-kontra-astros/ (2023-05-02) > abante.com.ph#?#.elementor-col-33 div[data-element_type=widget]:has(div[data-settings*=autoplay]) > ``` > The site has the heaviest use of Elementor element names I've ever seen, but I think I got close enough to something that works well enough above. > > The site appears to be fully in Filipino/Tagalog. > > The site has 793,000 monthly visits according to [SimilarWeb](https://www.similarweb.com/website/abante.com.ph/#overview). ### Screenshots
